cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of optimally allocating storage in a distributed storage system, which is a topic that falls under the categories of information theory (cs.IT), distributed computing (cs.DC), distributed systems (cs.DS), networked systems (cs.NI), and systems and control (cs.SY). The paper specifically deals with the optimization of storage allocation, which is a problem that is commonly studied in information theory and distributed computing. Therefore, cs.IT and cs.DC are the most likely categories. The paper also deals with distributed storage systems, which falls under the category of distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper discusses the use of codes to ensure successful recovery of data, which is a topic that falls under the category of networked systems (cs.NI). Finally, the paper deals with optimization, which is a topic that falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
